title: OpenAI DevDay 2023 Keynote
summary: Sam Altman and team walk through GPT-4 Turbo, Assistants API, and the company’s product road map during the DevDay keynote.

title: Introducing Gemini 1.5 Pro
summary: Gemini leads share how multimodal context windows stretch to 1M tokens and what that unlocks for live reasoning.

title: But What Is a Neural Network?
summary: Grant Sanderson visualizes how layers, activation functions, and training work—still the go-to explainer for newcomers to LLM internals.
